Mayfield, who was drafted by the Browns with the No. 1 overall pick in the 2018 NFL Draft, had a messy split with the team in 2021. After his fourth season with the Browns, and his second under head coach Kevin Stefanski, the team traded him to the Carolina Panthers for a fifth-round pick. summary: UK inflation rose to 3.4% in December 2025, exceeding economists' forecasts of 3.3%. The increase, driven by higher airfares, tobacco, and food prices, marks the first rise in five months. The Bank of England expects this uptick to be temporary and will consider the data at its upcoming interest rate decision on 5 February 2026.

title: Bulls Lakers Raptors and Suns Secure NBA Wins
snippets: Josh Morrissey and Mark Scheifele scored during a St. Louis double-minor for high-sticking in the first period before Scheifele added an empty netter to seal the win.
Mark Scheifele scored twice and added an assist, while Josh Morrissey also posted three points, as the Winnipeg Jets defeated the St. Louis Blues 3-1.
Tyler Kleven opened the scoring with his first goal of the season, while James Reimer stopped 21 of 22 shots, leading the Ottawa Senators to a 4-1 victory over the Columbus Blue Jackets.

Konsta Helenius finished with three points in only his second career NHL game, Noah Ostlund scored twice, and Peyton Krebs picked up a goal and an assist to lead the Buffalo Sabres to a 5-3 win over the Nashville Predators.

Brandon Hagel scored twice and finished with three points while Nikita Kucherov dished out two assists and Andrei Vasilevskiy stopped 22 shots to elevate the Tampa Bay Lightning to a 4-1 win over the San Jose Sharks.
Anton Forsberg made 28 saves in relief of an injured Darcy Kuemper and Kevin Fiala tallied a goal and an assist in the Los Angeles Kings’ 4-3 win over the New York Rangers.
Lane Hutson had a goal and an assist, and Cole Caufield fired home the game-winning goal with 15 seconds left in regulation as the Montreal Canadiens topped the Minnesota Wild 4-3.
Arseni Gritsyuk and Cody Glass each had a goal and an assist while Jake Allen gave up just one goal and made 21 saves to lead the New Jersey Devils to a 2-1 win over the Edmonton Oilers.

Justin Hryckowian finished with a goal and two assists, Miro Heiskanen recorded three assists of his own, and Jason Robertson scored twice in a dominant 6-2 victory for the Dallas Stars over the Boston Bruins.
Immanuel Quickley popped off for 40 points and 10 assists, while Scottie Barnes had 26 with seven rebounds and 11 dimes as the Toronto Raptors rolled to a 145-127 win over the Golden State Warriors.
The Los Angeles Lakers’ superstar duo of Luka Doncic and LeBron James combined for 57 points, 22 rebounds, and 18 assists in a 115-107 comeback win over the Denver Nuggets.
Reed Sheppard scored a team-high 21 points, and Alpren Sengun added 20 points and 13 rebounds as the Houston Rockets rallied late to defeat the San Antonio Spurs 111-106.
Coby White scored 27 points and added six assists to lead the Chicago Bulls to a 138-110 win over the Los Angeles Clippers.
Devin Booker dropped a team-high 27 points while Jordan Goodwin and Grayson Allen each scored 16 to lead the Phoenix Suns to a 116-110 win over the Philadelphia 76ers.
Bam Adebayo led the way with 25 points and Norman Powell added 22 as the Miami Heat defeated the Sacramento Kings 130-117.
